Posts.Content:
Thank you for your response. I go tomorrow to get a mammo and ultrasound done. I think I'll be taking a Xanax before going in. I thing the last time went I saw my images...I hope I can see them this time. My gyno is waiting for the results because I am due to have a different surgery in January. She said she might could get the results faster, like maybe as soon as Thursday.
If I get an abnormal result, what happens next? Can they tell me that over the phone, or do I have to come in to the office? And, what would that actually be able to tell fro the US and mammo? Just a mass, malignant, benign, or more info that that?
Sheesh, I have never looked so forward to getting squished before! (Not sure "looking forward to" is the right terminology for what I feel.)
Posts.Title: Found odd shaped lump...

Posts.Content:
Hi all,
 I am trying not to be too paranoid (but as you can probably imagine, I have scoured the 'net looking for info) here, but I found an odd shaped lump in the upper right part of my breast, more towards my armpit. The lump feels about
 1 1/2" by about
 1/2". Just south of the oblong feeling lump is a "ditch" under my skin that seems to go along the bottom edge of the lump. When I raise my arm above my head (standing), the ditch is visually noticeable, and when I lay down, you can just feel it.
 I am large busted, and have a history (mom and maternal grandmother) of breast cancer. My g-ma passed from it a few years ago. I had one mamo a few years ago that showed fibrous tissue that I never knew about
 or felt. This current lump does not hurt or move about
. It is solid, as well. 
 It's sort of ironic. I just had my yearly female exam, and am scheduled to have my annual mamo Tuesday. I had just remembered I had to cal my gyno to have them change the order to a "screening" instead of diagnostic, and happened to feel my breast unconsciously. I don't have to have them change the order now. 
 Anyhow, I just wondered if anyone has any thoughts on my lump.
Posts.Title: Found odd shaped lump...
